entry.title: Deeplearning Image Recognition with Python
entry.summary:
Description

An image says more than 1000 words" At StyleSage we collect and analyze e-commerce data from 150 million fashion products across 100+ countries - updated daily! Analyzing the images and understanding them is a critical step in categorizing products, extracting attributes and detecting outliers. Join us to understand how Convoluted Neural Network (CNN) algorithms can be used in Python for deeplearning image analysis.

http://2016.es.pycon.org/</a
